summary: Oh No!  Dovahkiin's worst fears have come true.  Nothing can be as bad as what had just happened to him.  Someone has stolen all of Dovahkiin's personal Jar collection!  It is your job to get all the jars back.  Little is know about who took the jars, it could have been many people or just one sneaky menace.  But one thing is for ce
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Georgia][b][u][size=4]What Does This Mod Add?[/size][/u][/b][/font][/center]
[size=2][center][font=Verdana][size=3]Dovahkiin's Jar Collection adds a series of custom made, lore-friendly, jars across the world that is Skyrim.  These jars can be found in different areas around the world.  The jars may be in simple locations like in a shop or by a Jarl's chair, others may be in locations that aren't as easy like near a boss.  As a traveler, one would find the jars as the move around the world.  It is a scavenger hunt for those who think they can find all 40 jars.  [/size][/font][/center]
[/size]
[center][b][u][font=Georgia][size=4]Where Are They Located? [/size][/font][/u][/b][/center]
[size=2] [/size][size=3][center][font=Verdana]Dovahkiin's Jars are located all over the place.  They jars locations were placed in locations that seemed like the best place based on what they contained.  [/font][/center]
[/size]
[center][b][u][font=Georgia][size=4]Who Is This Mod Directed Towards? [/size][/font][/u][/b][/center]
[font=Verdana][size=3][center]This mod is setup for anyone who would like to see more Jars into The Elder Scrolls: Skyrim, to those who like a challenge of finding things, and those who just would like to find a cool and unique item as they travel around the world.   [/center]
[/size][/font]

[size=4][b][u][center][font=Georgia]What Else Is In The Mod?[/font][/center][/u][center][/center][/b][size=2][center][font=Verdana][size=3]Other then the 40 Jars, the mod adds a new location(Not connected to the main world/game).  This location is not meant to be apart of the game in anyway, it's just a new room I have created and placed all of my custom meshes in.  The room allows people to take a look at all of the meshes(jars).  In this room there is also a new NPC named "Jartender" (like bartender), he is just there to look pretty. [/size][/font][/center]
[size=4][b][u][center][font=Georgia]How Do I Install It? [/font][/center][/u][center][/center][/b][center][font=Verdana][size=3]1.  Install the mod
2.  Unpack the archive and place whatever is in it in your data folder
or
Place the mod's archive in whatever launcher you use(or example Mod Organizer)
3.  Run the game
[/size]
[/font][/center]
[center][b][u][font=Georgia][size=4]How Do I Uninstall It?
[/size][/font][/u][/b][/center][size=2][size=3][center][font=Verdana]If you need to uninstall the file, just remove anything you added to the Skyrim/data folder.  If you don't know what the file(s) are just reinstall the file and use that as a reference.[/font][/center]
[/size]
[center][b][u][font=Georgia][size=4]I Like You Mod, But Can I Change It?  What Permission Are You Giving Me? [/size][/font][/u][/b][/center][/size][size=2][center][/center][center][font=Verdana][size=3]Of course you can edit the mod all you want.  I am giving you permission to change and edit the mod, however I do not give you permission to re-upload or post my file.  If you edit the file and upload your own file, then please give me credit and leave a link to this site.[/size] [/font][/center]
[/size]
[center][b][u][font=Georgia][size=4]Known Issues[/size][/font][/u][/b][/center][size=2][center][font=Verdana][size=3]As of right now I do not know of any problems or issues from the mod.[/size] [/font][/center]
[/size][center]
[b][u][font=Georgia][size=4]Credits[/size][/font][/u][/b][/center][/size][/size][/size][size=3][center]Bethesda
NifSkope
Creation Kit
Nexus Community[/center]
[/size][center]
[size=4][b][u][font=Georgia]Author[/font][/u][/b][/size]
[size=4][size=3]BountyBeme[/size][/size][/center]
author: BountyBeme
